description: [``botocore``] Add ability to trigger pipelines from git tags, define variables at pipeline level and new pipeline type V2.

[``botocore``] This release updates the documentation for InstanceInterruptionBehavior and HibernationOptionsRequest to more accurately describe the behavior of these two parameters when using Spot hibernation.
[``botocore``] Added support for Cluster Subnet and Security Group mutability.
[``botocore``] Add the partitional endpoint for IAM in iso-f.
[``botocore``] This release introduces DeleteHomeRegionControl API that customers can use to delete the Migration Hub Home Region configuration

[``botocore``] This release introduces multi-data-source feature in Migration Hub Strategy Recommendations. This feature now supports vCenter as a data source to fetch inventory in addition to ADS and Import from file workflow that is currently supported with MHSR collector.

[``botocore``] This release includes the following new APIs: CreateLifecyclePolicy, UpdateLifecyclePolicy, BatchGetLifecyclePolicy, DeleteLifecyclePolicy, ListLifecyclePolicies and BatchGetEffectiveLifecyclePolicy to support the data lifecycle management feature.
